text: ليس لها من دون الله كاشفة

translations.translation: No one besides Allah can unveil it.
There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
and none but Allah can avert it.
No one besides God can rescue a soul from hardship.
None except Allah can avert it.
None besides Allah can avert it.
There shall be none besides Allah to remove it.
apart from God none can disclose it.
None beside Allah can disclose it.
None but God can avert it.
None, except Allah, can avert it.
There is none who may unveil it besides Allah.
No (soul) but Allah can lay it bare.
None besides Allah can avert it, (or advance it, or delay it).
none except Allah can disclose it.
None besides God can unveil it.
Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
[53:58] None, [no] soul, besides God can disclose it, that is to say, only He can disclose it and manifest it, as where He says: He alone shall reveal it, at its proper time [Q. 7:187].
(None beside Allah can disclose it) none except Allah can reveal its advent and exact time.
